name: Turtle Trial
description:
A game about a turtle who has lost it's way in the world. it must escape or be doomed an existence of isolation and misery.

Play the "Lost Ocean Path".

An underground current has dragged you into an enclosed part of the ocean surrounded by rocks.
You feel strange as your body is changing and becoming stronger.
Find a way out and discover a history long forgotten.

Play the "Scrooge Redemption".

You are punished for your greed and must redeem yourself before moving on to the afterlife. Donate to charities while surviving this cold and harsh environment.

"Scrooge Redemption" is harder then "Lost Ocean Path" and is treated as a bonus level to lost ocean path so keep that in mind.

Enjoy.  Also check out my channel for more game updates: proTaleDev.
